UH-UH, THIS IS GREAT! SCARED?

translation.ja: そいつらは草食だからケンカはしない この肉食の奴らはケンカが大好きだ

translation.en: BUT THESE ARE CARNIVORES, AND THEY REALLY LIKE FIGHTING WITH EACH OTHER.
translation.ja: この肉食の奴らはケンカが大好きだ

translation.en: THEY USE THEIR TEETH AND CLAWS TO RIP EACH OTHER'S THROATS OUT.
translation.ja: ツメや歯で相手のノドを切り裂くんだ

translation.en: IS MY NAME ALAN?

translation.en: INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS, MOSTLY TREATY LAW AND THINGS LIKE THAT.
translation.ja: 国際関係です  条約などを

translation.ja: 僕が行く

translation.en: HERE, I'LL GET HER. YOU GUYS... CATCH UP.

translation.en: RAPTORS, MOSTLY. MY FAVORITE.
translation.ja: ラプトルだ 懐かしい

translation.ja: あの声 覚えてる？

translation.en: I TRY NOT TO.
translation.ja: イヤな声

translation.en: ELLIE, ALL OUR THEORIES ABOUT RAPTOR INTELLIGENCE,
translation.ja: ラプトルの能力に関する僕らの理論だが⸺

translation.en: WHAT THEY WERE CAPABLE OF-- WE WEREN'T EVEN CLOSE.
translation.ja: ラプトルの能力に関する僕らの理論だが⸺ まるで甘かった

translation.en: WE DID CRANIAL SCANS OF A FOSSIL SKULL. TELL ME.

translation.en: WE FOUND WHAT LOOKS LIKE A VERY SOPHISTICATED RESONATING CHAMBER.
translation.ja: 非常に精巧な共鳴腔を見つけた

translation.en: SO WE WERE RIGHT? THEY HAD THE ABILITY TO VOCALIZE?
translation.ja: じゃ 声が出せるって正しかったのね

translation.en: I'M CONVINCED THAT'S THE KEY TO THEIR SOCIAL INTELLIGENCE.
translation.ja: 互いに意思を通じてる

translation.en: WHICH EXPLAINS WHY THEY COULD WORK TOGETHER AS A TEAM.
translation.ja: だから 群れで行動を？

translation.en: AND COORDINATE THEIR ATTACKS SO THE PREY WOULDN'T KNOW WHAT WAS GOING ON.
translation.ja: 組織的に獲物を攻撃する

translation.en: - THEY COULD TALK TO EACH OTHER. - TO A DEGREE WE NEVER IMAGINED.
translation.ja: 互いに話せるの？ 想像以上だ

translation.en: - [ Sighs ] - ELLIE, THEY WERE SMART.
translation.ja: とても頭がいい

translation.en: THEY WERE SMARTER THAN DOLPHINS OR WHALES.
translation.ja: イルカやクジラより⸺

translation.en: THEY WERE SMARTER THAN PRIMATES.
translation.ja: 霊長類よりも

translation.en: I JUST WANT TO SAY, IF YOU EVER NEED HELP WITH ANYTHING-- SOMETIMES YOU FORGET TO ASK.
translation.ja: 私で力になれることがあったら 遠慮しないで⸺

translation.en: SO YOU CAN CALL ME.
translation.ja: 電話して  いつでもよ

translation.en: SURE. ANYTHING, ANYTIME.
translation.ja: 電話して  いつでもよ 分かった

translation.en: YOU'RE STILL THE BEST.
translation.ja: あなたは やはり⸺

translation.en: I MEAN THAT.
translation.ja: 一番よ

translation.en: THE LAST OF MY BREED.
translation.ja: 絶滅寸前だ

translation.en: [ Alan's Voice ] THROUGH THE PAINSTAKING STUDY OF THE ANTERIOR CHAMBER...

translation.en: IN MULTIPLE SPECIMENS, WE CAN DETERMINE THE EXCITING CORRELATION... BETWEEN THE UPPER PALATE AND THE LARYNX.
translation.ja: 上部口蓋と喉頭の驚くべき相互関係が確認できます

translation.en: THIS LETS US THEORIZE-- THEORIZE, MIND YOU--
translation.ja: これにより ラプトルは⸺

translation.en: THAT THE RAPTOR WAS CAPABLE OF SOPHISTICATED VOCALIZATIONS...
translation.ja: 高度な 声を発する能力があり⸺

translation.en: WHICH WOULD HAVE BEEN A TREMENDOUS EVOLUTIONARY ADVANTAGE.
translation.ja: 実に 進化に適していたと言えるのです

translation.en: RAPTORS WERE FIERCE, INTELLIGENT AND SOCIALLY SOPHISTICATED.
translation.ja: ラプトルは どう猛で知的で社会的であり⸺

translation.en: THEY WERE ABLE TO HUNT IN NUMBERS... AND COORDINATE THEIR EFFORTS.
translation.ja: 群れで狩りをし組織的攻撃ができた

translation.en: WERE IT NOT FOR THE CATACLYSMIC EVENTS WHICH OVERTOOK THEM,
translation.ja: 地殻変動で滅びなければ⸺

translation.en: IT IS ENTIRELY POSSIBLE THAT RAPTORS RATHER THAN HUMANS...

translation.en: WOULD HAVE BECOME THE DOMINANT SPECIES ON THIS PLANET.

translation.en: I HOPE THIS HAS BEEN OF INTEREST. IT CERTAINLY EXCITES US AS PALEONTOLOGISTS.
translation.ja: ご興味あるでしょう古生物学者には特にです

translation.en: SORRY. THERE'S MUCH, MUCH MORE TO DISCOVER.

translation.en: THAT IS WHY WE CONTINUE TO NEED AND ASK FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

translation.en: THANK YOU.

translation.en: THANK YOU VERY MUCH, DR. GRANT.

translation.en: WHAT IS LEFT OF THEM IS FOSSILIZED IN THE ROCKS.

translation.en: MR. BRENNAN.
translation.ja: ブレナン君

translation.en: THEN THIS THING SCULPTS IT, ONE LAYER AT A TIME.
translation.ja: その断層を合わせて復元するんです

translation.en: IT'S DONE. [ Beeps ]

translation.en: LISTEN TO THIS.
translation.ja: 聞いて

translation.en: WOW. THIS IS BRILLIANT, BILLY. REALLY, IT IS.
translation.ja: こいつはすごいな

translation.en: SAD TO SAY, IT'S JUST A LITTLE BIT LATE. [ Footsteps Approaching ]

translation.en: WELL, UM, FIRST THING, I'M A GREAT ADMIRER OF YOURS,

translation.en: WOULD YOU HAVE DINNER WITH MY WIFE AND ME THIS EVENING? IT'LL BE OUR TREAT.
translation.ja: 妻と一緒に夕食でもいかがです？ うれしいが旅で疲れてるので

translation.en: WELL, THAT'D BE GREAT, BUT I'M TIRED. I'VE BEEN TRAVELING.
translation.ja: うれしいが旅で疲れてるので

translation.en: BELIEVE ME, THIS WILL BE WORTH YOUR WHILE. MAYBE SOME OTHER TIME.
translation.ja: また今度 いい話なんです

translation.en: WE'D LOVE TO. OH, TERRIFIC.
translation.ja: よろこんで よかった  さすがだ

translation.en: THAT'S THE SPIRIT. GOOD. THIS EVENING THEN.

translation.en: OH, BILLY. DR. GRANT. HOW ARE YOU?
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY, HOW ARE YOU? AMANDA, BILLY.
translation.ja: アマンダ  ビリー よろしく

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU BOYS DRINKING?
translation.ja: 飲み物は？

translation.en: ICE PICK, CATFISH. TWO, PLEASE, CAT.

translation.en: REALLY TRULY INSPIRING. WE'VE ADMIRED YOUR WORK FOR YEARS.
translation.ja: 立派な研究を 感心してますわ

translation.en: AMANDA AND I JUST LOVE THE OUTDOORS.
translation.ja: 私たちは冒険が好きで⸺

translation.en: HECK, WE'VE BEEN ON JUST ABOUT EVERY ADVENTURE TOUR THEY CAN COME UP WITH.
translation.ja: 大抵の所へは行ってます

translation.en: THE NILE, GALAPAGOS, K2.
translation.ja: ナイル  ガラパゴス Ｋ２

translation.en: WE EVEN HAVE TWO SEATS RESERVED ON THE FIRST COMMERCIAL FLIGHT TO THE MOON.
translation.ja: 月旅行への予約までしてますの

translation.en: AND FOR OUR WEDDING ANNIVERSARY THIS YEAR WE WANTED TO DO SOMETHING REALLY SPECIAL.
translation.ja: 結婚記念に 今年は特別な所へ行きたい

translation.en: ONCE IN A LIFETIME. SOMETHING-- SO...
translation.ja: 一生の思い出に そこで ソルナ島へ飛行機をチャーターした

translation.en: I'VE CHARTERED AN AIRPLANE TO FLY US OVER ISLA SORNA...
translation.ja: そこで ソルナ島へ飛行機をチャーターした

translation.en: AND WE'D LIKE YOU TO BE OUR GUIDE.
translation.ja: ガイドを頼みたい

translation.en: THERE YOU GO, GUYS.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: THAT'S A VERY KIND OFFER, MR. KIRBY, BUT I'M A VERY, VERY BUSY MAN.
translation.ja: せっかくのお話だが⸺ 私はとても忙しい誰か適当な人を紹介します

translation.en: I CAN RECOMMEND A COUPLE OF GUYS WHO ARE REALLY HIGHLY QUALIFIED THAT--
translation.ja: 私はとても忙しい誰か適当な人を紹介します

translation.en: NO, NO, NO. YOU'RE THE BEST.
translation.ja: いや  あなたしかいない

translation.en: YOU'VE SEEN THESE ANIMALS IN THE FLESH. THERE'S NO ONE THAT EVEN COMES CLOSE TO YOU.
translation.ja: あなたは恐竜を体験してる他にはいない

translation.en: YOU WOULDN'T BE ABLE TO FLY LOW ENOUGH TO SEE ANYTHING OF ANY REAL INTEREST.
translation.ja: 恐竜が見えるほど低くは飛べない

translation.en: WELL, SEE? THAT'S THE INTERESTING PART... BECAUSE WE HAVE PERMISSION TO FLY LOW.
translation.ja: ところが 私たち低く飛ぶ許可を取ったの

translation.en: [ Billy ] HOW LOW? I'M NO AVIATION EXPERT,
translation.ja: どのくらい？ 私は専門家ではないが普通よりは低く飛べる

translation.en: BUT A HECK OF A LOT LOWER THAN ANYBODY ELSE, I CAN TELL YOU.
translation.ja: 私は専門家ではないが普通よりは低く飛べる

translation.en: FROM WHAT I UNDERSTAND, IT'S PRETTY MUCH-- IT'S WHATEVER WE WANT.
translation.ja: 私たちの好きなだけ低く飛んでいいの

translation.en: THAT'S HARD TO BELIEVE. YOU SEE, THROUGH MY BUSINESS DEALINGS--
translation.ja: あり得ない 私は商売上貿易や市場開拓の関係で⸺

translation.en: IMPORT, EXPORT, EMERGING MARKETS--
translation.ja: 私は商売上貿易や市場開拓の関係で⸺

translation.en: I'VE MADE A LOT OF FRIENDS IN HIGH PLACES.
translation.ja: 高官の知り合いが多い

translation.en: IN THIS CASE, THE COSTA RICAN GOVERNMENT.
translation.ja: コスタリカ政府にも

translation.en: DR. GRANT, YOU HAVE NO IDEA HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO US THAT YOU COME ALONG.
translation.ja: グラント博士  あなたにご一緒して頂きたいの

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY, I-I-- IT WOULD MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE.
translation.ja: どうしても 奥さん むろん研究に寄付をさせて頂きますよ

translation.en: AND, OF COURSE, WE'D LOVE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION TO YOUR RESEARCH HERE. SO--
translation.ja: むろん研究に寄付をさせて頂きますよ ほら

translation.en: I COULD WRITE ALL KINDS OF NUMBERS ON THIS CHECK, DR. GRANT.
translation.ja: お望みの金額を小切手に

translation.en: TELL ME...
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: WHAT'S IT GONNA TAKE?
translation.ja: いくらです？

translation.en: EVEN WITH WHAT I PAY YOU, COULDN'T YOU AFFORD A BETTER BAG?
translation.ja: 新しいバッグぐらい買えないのか？

translation.en: NO WAY. THIS ONE'S LUCKY.
translation.ja: これは⸺ 幸運のお守りです

translation.en: A COUPLE YEARS AGO, SOME BUDDIES AND I...
translation.ja: 数年前 ニュージーランドで⸺

translation.en: WENT HANG GLIDING OFF THESE CLIFFS IN NEW ZEALAND...

translation.en: AND THIS BIG UPDRAFT CAME AND SWEPT ME RIGHT AGAINST THE SIDE, WHAM!
